contents.name: network-addon-mod-controller
contents.summary: The NAM controller contains the main internal network logic

contents.name: network-addon-mod
contents.summary: Install the full feature set of the NAM: a myriad of new transport network items and transit-related bugfixes

contents.name: real-highway-mod
contents.summary: Add a series of new highway networks and interchanges

contents.name: network-addon-mod-textures
contents.summary: NAM textures and drive side support

contents.name: network-addon-mod-core
contents.summary: Base content of the NAM excluding optional components

contents.name: network-widening-mod
contents.summary: Add a number of surface-road networks providing different widths and higher capacity

contents.name: street-addon-mod
contents.summary: Add a variety of cosmetic override networks based on the Street network

contents.name: additional-transit-stations
contents.summary: Add a multitude of new transit stations beyond the game's default
